thread.title: BRIEF-Owens Corning Says On May 4, 2018, Owens Corning Entered Into A Credit Agreement

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Owens Corning Says On May 4, 2018, Owens Corning Entered Into A Credit Agreement
text:
May 4 (Reuters) - Owens Corning:
* OWENS CORNING - ON MAY 4, 2018, OWENS CORNING ENTERED INTO A CREDIT AGREEMENT - SEC FILING
* OWENS CORNING - CREDIT AGREEMENT REPLACES COMPANYâ€™S EXISTING AMENDED AND RESTATED CREDIT AGREEMENT, DATED AS OF NOVEMBER 13, 2015
* OWENS CORNING - COMPANY DID NOT INCUR ANY EARLY TERMINATION PENALTIES IN CONNECTION WITH TERMINATION OF EXISTING CREDIT AGREEMENT
* OWENS CORNING - CREDIT AGREEMENT PROVIDES FOR A REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY IN AN AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF $800 MILLION
* OWENS CORNING - CREDIT FACILITY MATURES ON EARLIER OF MAY 4, 2023
* OWENS CORNING - IN ADDITION, ON MAY 4, 2018, COMPANY ENTERED INTO A FIRST AMENDMENT TO ITS TERM LOAN AGREEMENT, DATED OCTOBER 27, 2017 Source text :( bit.ly/2IeWboQ ) Further company coverage:
